code: export function parseJwt(token){try{const base64Url=token.split('.')[1];const base64=base64Url.replace(/-/g,'+').replace(/_/g,'/');const jsonPayload=decodeURIComponent(atob(base64).split('').map(c=>'%'+('00'+c.charCodeAt(0).toString(16)).slice(-2)).join(''));return JSON.parse(jsonPayload);}catch(e){return null;}}
